chart_description: This chart displays the condition of the pods in the cluster nodes. The dimensions represent the pod's readiness status during its life cycle.

dimension_descriptions.containers_ready: The number of containers in the pod that are ready to use.
dimension_descriptions.pod_initialized: The number of containers in the pod that have been initialized.
dimension_descriptions.pod_ready: The number of containers in the pod that are ready to use and all containers have passed their readiness checks.
dimension_descriptions.pod_scheduled: The number of containers in the pod that have been scheduled to run on a node.
